delete.title: Delete?
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the current house/room?

overview.title: It’s easy to get started on Airbnb

1.title: Tell us about your place
1.description: Share some basic info, like where it is and how many guests can stay.

2.title: Make it stand out
2.description: Add 5 or more photos plus a title and description—we’ll help you out.

3.title: Finish up and publish
3.description: Choose a starting price, verify a few details, then publish your listing.

about-your-place.title: Tell us about your place
about-your-place.subtitle: Step 1
about-your-place.description: In this step, we'll ask you which type of property you have and if guests will book the entire place or just a room. Then let us know the location and how many guests can stay.

structure.title: Which of these best describes your place?

privacy-type.title: What type of place will guests have?

ENTIRE.title: An entire place
ENTIRE.description: Guests have the whole place to themselves.

ROOM.title: A room
ROOM.description: Guests have their own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces.

SHARED.title: A shared room
SHARED.description: Guests sleep in a room or common area that may be shared with you or others.

title.map: Is the pin in the right spot?

location.description: Your address is only shared with guests after they’ve made a reservation.

map.title: Show your specific location
map.description: Make it clear to guests where your place is located. We'll only share your address after they've made a reservation.

tooltip.active: Double click here to make marker draggable

floor-plan.title: Share some basics about your place
floor-plan.description: You'll add more details later, like bed types.

stand-out.title: Make your place stand out
stand-out.subtitle: Step 2
stand-out.description: In this step, you’ll add some of the amenities your place offers, plus 5 or more photos. Then, you’ll create a title and description.

amenities.title: Tell guests what your place has to offer
amenities.description: You can add more amenities after you publish your listing.
amenities.subtitle2: Do you have any standout amenities?
amenities.subtitle3: Do you have any of these safety items?

photos.title: Add some photos of your house
photos.description: You'll need 5 photos to get started. You can add more or make changes later.

title.title: Now, let's give your house a title
title.description: Short titles work best. Have fun with it—you can always change it later.

description.title: Create your description
description.description: Share what makes your place special.
description.valueDefault: You'll have a wonderful time at this comfortable accommodation.

finish-setup.title: Finish up and publish
finish-setup.subtitle: Step 3
finish-setup.description: Finally, you'll choose booking settings, set up pricing, and publish your listing.

false.title: Approve or decline requests
false.description: Guests must ask if they can book.

discount.title: Add discounts
discount.description: Help your place stand out to get booked faster and earn your first reviews.

seven_nights.title: Weekly discount
seven_nights.description: For stays of 7 nights or more

one_month.title: Monthly discount
one_month.description: For stays of 28 nights or more

receipt.title: Review your listing
receipt.description: Here's what we'll show to guests. Make sure everything looks good.

confirm.title: Confirm a few details and publish
confirm.description: We’ll let you know if you need to verify your identity or register with the local government.

calendar.title: Set up your calendar
calendar.description: Choose which dates your listing is available. It will be visible 24 hours after you publish.

settings.title: Adjust your settings
settings.description: Set house rules, select a cancellation policy, choose how guests book, and more.
